resources.string: WLAN hotspot not available in airplane mode
"Airplane mode is turned on. You won't be able to use the Internet, email or other apps that need a data connection unless you use WLAN."

"Airplane mode is turned on. You won't be able to use the Internet, email or other apps that need a data connection unless you use WLAN. Your phone's video-calling function won't work in Airplane mode."
"When Airplane mode is on, you won't be able to use the Internet, email or other apps that require a data connection unless you use WLAN. "

"When Airplane mode is on, you won't be able to use the Internet, email or other apps that require a data connection unless you use WLAN. Your phone's video-calling function won't work in Airplane mode."
